2- अलेक्जेंडर रीड
3- थॉमस मुनरो

नीचे दिए गए कूट का प्रयोग कर सही उत्तर चुनिए -

(a) केवल 1
(b) केवल 1 और 3
(c) केवल 2 और 3
(d) 1, 2 और 3

, choose correct answer:

data.sampled:
5 Reasons Why People Love The Assistant at Office of Disability Services
As an AI language model, I don’t experience emotions or feelings like humans do. However, I can analyze and understand why people love the assistant at Office of Disability Services. Here are the five reasons why people love the assistant: 

1. Availability: The assistant is available to students and staff members who need help with their disability accommodations. The service is available around the clock, so people can get help when they need it, even if they need to send an email in the middle of the night. People feel confident knowing that someone is there to help them whenever they need it.

2. Knowledgeable: The assistant has a vast knowledge of disability accommodations. They can answer any questions you have about what assistance is available and how to obtain it. The assistant is knowledgeable and experienced in helping people with different types of disabilities.

3. Personalized Service: The assistant understands that every person's disability is unique, and they offer personalized service to each person who needs help. They take the time to understand each individual's needs and create a plan specifically for them. The assistant is not just providing cookie-cutter solutions, but they are working with each person to come up with a plan that works best for them.

4. Professionalism: The assistant is professional in their dealings with people with disabilities. They show empathy and respect, and they treat each person they work with with dignity and kindness. The assistant understands that people with disabilities may need additional support and do their best to make the process as smooth and easy as possible.

5. Responsiveness: The assistant offers fast and responsive assistance to everyone who contacts them. They are quick to respond to emails, phone calls and other communications to help solve people's problems efficiently, which makes them feel cared for and respected.

3- यह एक कार्यक्रम है जिसका लक्ष्य एक दशक में हमारे देश में सभी वित्तीय लेन-देनों को पूरी तरह से डिजिटल करना है।

1- TRAFFIC, संयुक्त राष्ट्र पर्यावरण कार्यक्रम (UNEP) के अंतर्गत एक ब्यूरो है।
2- TRAFFIC का मिशन यह सुनिश्चित करना है कि वन्य पादपों और जन्तुओं के व्यापार से प्रकृति के संरक्षण को खतरा न हो।

2- यह एक 12-सदस्यीय निकाय है जिसमें RBI का गवर्नर शामिल है तथा प्रत्येक वर्ष इसका पुनर्गठन किया जाता है।
3- यह केन्द्रीव वित्त मंत्री की अध्यक्षता में कार्य करती है।

(a) केवल 1
(b) केवल 1 और 2
(c) केवल 3
(d) केवल 2 और 3

, choose correct answer:

data.sampled:
To change the name of a class in RStudio's assistant, follow these steps:

1. Click on "File" in the top-left corner of the screen and scroll down to "Project"
2. Click on "Project Options" and select "New Class"
3. In the "Name" field, enter the new name for the class
4. Click "Create" and "Close"
5. In the assistant, select the previously created class and hover over the name
6. Press "Edit Class" and enter the new name in the "ClassName" field
7. Save and close the assistant

After following these steps, the name of the class in the assistant should be changed to the new name.

data.sampled:
"Sorry, but I am no longer a doctor. I am the office assistant and receptionist. I apologize for my misleading greeting. How may I assist you?"
Patient: "Oh, I'm sorry. I need to make an appointment with Dr. Smith for today."
Assistant: "I'm sorry, Dr. Smith is not available today. He is currently out of the office on personal business. Can I assist you with scheduling an appointment with another doctor?"
Patient: "Oh, no. I really need to see Dr. Smith. Do you know when he'll be back?"
Assistant: "I'm sorry, but Dr. Smith will be out of the office for several days. Is there anything else I can help you with, or can you leave a message for Dr. Smith and he'll return your call as soon as he is available?"

data.sampled:
"How can I support you?"
<you>: "I am planning to move to Boston to attend school. Can you help me find a suitable rental property?"
Assistant: "Of course! Do you have any specific requirements or preferences for your new rental?"
<you>: "I need to be close to public transportation and shops. A one-bedroom apartment would be ideal, but I am also open to studio apartments with enough storage space."
Assistant: "That's great! Let me do some research and come up with some options for you. Would you like me to arrange viewings or do you prefer to go through the listings on your own?"
<you>: "I would like you to arrange viewings for me. That way, I will not waste time looking at places that I know won't work for me."
Assistant: "Sure! I'll send you the available listings once I've sorted them out. Is there anything else I can help you with in the meantime?"

prompt.content:
19. भारत में एक ऐसा स्थान है, जहाँ यदि आप समुद्र किनारे खड़े होकर समुद्र का अवलोकन करें, तो आप पाएँगे कि दिन में दो बार समुद्री जल तटीय रेखा से कुछ किलोमीटर पीछे की ओर चला जाता है और फिर तट पर वापस आता है, और जब जल पीछे हटा होता है, तब आप वास्तव में समुद्र तल पर चल सकते हैं। यह अनूठी घटना कहाँ देखी जाती है?
(a) भावनगर में
(b) भीमुनिपटनम में
(c) चांदीपुर में
(d) नागपट्टिनम में

, choose correct answer:

data.sampled:
-
Assistant Professor of Clinical Dermatology
The Department of Dermatology at Tulane University School of Medicine is seeking a qualified academic clinical dermatologist with a strong interest in patient care and education to join our faculty of six full-time dermatologists. We serve at Tulane University Medical Center – a 289 bed community-based medical center located near historic uptown New Orleans. Our large service area includes patients of all ages and backgrounds. We are looking for candidates with exceptional skills and dedication to clinical dermatology, who are committed to teaching and mentoring dermatology residents and medical students. We also have an active clinical research group with a focus on psoriasis, melanoma and allergic contact dermatitis.
The Department serves our surrounding community and provides exceptional patient care, which includes inpatient consultations, dermatopathology interpretation, phototherapy, photodynamic therapy and the use of many biologics. Residents rotate through us and receive high quality training in dermatology from attending physicians who are national leaders in the field. Our residents and medical students receive ample opportunities for research, clinical experiences and one-on-one time with attendings. The residency program has strong ties to the dermatology community, and we work closely with leaders in the dermatology field to provide our residents with an excellent training experience.
Candidates must have an MD or DO degree and be Board Certified/Board Eligible in Dermatology.
Interested applicants should email their CV to:
Gena Guidry | Physician Recruiter
Tulane University School of Medicine
New Orleans, LA 70112

data.sampled:
(508) 286-4552 Email: jmarshall@mbl.edu
The Marshall laboratory studies the population biology and genomics of marine microbes. Our overall goal is to understand the mechanisms underlying the evolution of microbial speciation and community assembly, particularly in the ocean. For thousands of years, humans relied on small boats and sails to move about the ocean, and so the sea was our only option if we were to understand and explain this vast and complex ecosystem. Over the past half century, however, the field of oceanography has taken advantage of major advances in technology – from remote sensing via satellites and autonomous vehicles to the massive parallelization possible in our DNA sequence genomics laboratories. This evolution of tools has changed the way scientists think about the ocean – with an unprecedented ability to observe at different spatial and temporal scales – from the global ocean color and plankton ecology through to the molecular structure of the DNA in living microbes.
Our work is focused around three main themes:
Research in our laboratory is primarily applied to microorganisms from the marine environment, with a special focus on the uncultured bacterioplankton – the dominant components of the prokaryotic community in the sea. Most of microbes in the ocean cannot be cultured in laboratory settings, so a key approach to understanding these organisms is to use modern DNA sequencing technologies, primarily 16S rRNA gene sequencing. We are using these genetic technologies to understand the ecology and genomics of marine microbes from the North Pacific, Atlantic and Southern Oceans. These studies involve the analysis of DNA samples derived from seawater samples, environmental DNA filters, biofilms and natural microbial consortia isolated from different environments. For many of our studies, we are developing new molecular tools to understand the biogeography of these microorganisms and their interactions with their environment.
The Marshall lab is also very interested in understanding how microbes live in low nutrient environments, such as polar oceans and the deep ocean. We have a

2- ऋग्वेद-कालीन आर्यों को स्वर्ण, चाँदी और ताम्र का ज्ञान था जबकि सिन्धु घाटी के लोगों को कवल ताम्र और लोह का ज्ञान था।
3- ऋग्वेद-कालीन आर्यों ने घोड़े को पालतू बना लिया था जबकि इस बात का कोई साक्ष्य नहीं है कि सिन्धु घाअी के लोग इस पशु को जानते थे।
